labs.vex.lumen.hardware

Class HardwareProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • labs.vex.lumen.hardware.HardwareProcessor

  • public class HardwareProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class used to convert from Hardware components to actual devices
    Author:
    vex | Ciobanu Laurentiu

        public static void process(Hardware[] hardwareList,
                           IHardwareHandler handler)
        Convert batch of hardware components

        handler - the hardware handler used in process

      • process

        public static void process(Hardware hardware,
                           IHardwareHandler handler,
                           Hardware parent)
        Convert the specific hardware component to its actual device and store it in the internal hardware map for later usage
        Parameters:
        hardware - the component
        handler - the handler that will be used
        parent - the parent of the component (use null if it's a root)
